definition: to rely on others for the air one breathes (idiom); to depend on sb's whim for one's living
surname Yang
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
nose
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: But, AngRenBiXi life is very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 但是，仰人鼻息的生活非常困難。

sentences.english: The Government itself lies prone in the dust with the iron heel of Wall Street upon its neck.
sentences.chinese: 政府本身只能匍匐在華爾街的鐵蹄下，仰人鼻息。

sentences.english: She seemed averse to being under pecuniary obligations .
sentences.chinese: 她似乎不願在經濟上仰人鼻息。
